extendedInfo.description: Dead Space Jigsaw PuzzleDead Space is a third-person shooter survival horror video game developed by EA Redwood Shores (now Visceral Games) for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360, the game was released on all platforms through October 2008. The game puts the player in control of an engineer named Isaac Clarke, who battles the Necromorphs, reanimated human corpses, aboard an interstellar mining ship, the USG Ishimura. The game was met with positive critical reception, and has sold over 2 million copies. Dead Space 2 and Dead Space 3 were released on January 25, 2011 and February 5, 2013, respectively.This game contains the best pictures of your favorite theme. Now you can at any time and anywhere you want to play puzzle games and get pleasure.For the game does not need internet connection.This app will add a few search access points on your device.
